metadata.subject: New York Times article about Trump and Stormy Daniels

relationships.description: Email communication between Jeffrey Epstein and Nicholas Ribis sharing news article

notable_quotes: The information contained in this communication is confidential, may be attorney-client privileged

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion - simply sharing a public news article

details: Shares New York Times article about Trump and Stormy Daniels scandal

analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails Nicholas Ribis a New York Times article link about the Trump-Stormy Daniels scandal, with a brief 'please note' message and standard confidentiality disclaimer.
